name: FRED E. YOUNG, INC. v. Sterling J. MATHIEU and Rita L. Mathieu, his wife, Appellants
name_abbreviation: Fred E. Young, Inc. v. Mathieu

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, and MANDERINO, JJ.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: FRED E. YOUNG, INC. v. Sterling J. MATHIEU and Rita L. Mathieu, his wife, Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: T. Dean Lower, Hollidaysburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
335 A.2d 351
FRED E. YOUNG, INC. v. Sterling J. MATHIEU and Rita L. Mathieu, his wife, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 14, 1975.
Decided April 17, 1975.
Amos Davis, Altoona, for appellants.
T. Dean Lower, Hollidaysburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, and MANDERINO, JJ.
